name: Bible Black Uniform
description:
Lora to add the uniform from Bible Black to any character,

Look in the model notes about generation tips and know issues.

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
Use with .8

Know issues:

  • Some times adds a coat instead the vest, use coat in neg prompt

  • Some times adds socks instead of thighhighs, add thighhighs to prompt

  • In realistic models, by default, the most girls looks like Imari
